level.text: A foster parent shall keep the home clean and free of hazards and debris.
A foster parent shall keep all plumbing in working order.
A foster home shall have an adequate supply of hot water for bathing and dishwashing.
Hot water accessible to foster children shall not exceed one hundred twenty degrees (120 [degrees]) Fahrenheit at the outlet.

A foster parent shall take measures to keep the house and premises free of rodents and insects. If evidence of rodents or insects is present, the foster parent shall have the home exterminated within five (5) days and shall have documentation of the extermination.
